org.ossnipes.snipes.utils
Class Configuration

java.lang.Object
  org.ossnipes.snipes.utils.Configuration

public final class Configuration
extends java.lang.Object

Snipes configuration utilities. This class cannot be dirived from, and cannot be a instance object.

Method Detail

lookUp

public static java.lang.String lookUp(java.lang.String key)
Looks up a property in the configuration file and returns it.

Parameters:
key - The "key" of the configuration directive
Returns:
The value of the property if found, null if not. See lookUp(String key, String defaultValue) for default value behaviour.

lookUp

public static java.lang.String lookUp(java.lang.String key,
                                      java.lang.String defaultValue)
Looks up a property in the configuration file and returns it. If it is not found, returns defaultValue.

Parameters:
key - The "key" of the configuration directive.
defaultValue - The value to return if it is not found.
Returns:
The value of the property if it was found, defaultValue if not.

getSplitProperty

public static java.lang.String[] getSplitProperty(java.lang.String key,
                                                  java.lang.String defaultValue,
                                                  java.lang.String regex,
                                                  boolean useTrimming)
Splits the value of the given key by the regular expression provided.

Parameters:
key - The key to get.
regex - The regular expression to split by.
defaultValue - The default value to use if the key is not found
useTrimming - If we should trim the resulting String array of trailing whitespace
Returns:
The value of the key, split by the specified regular expression if the key exists. Uses defaultValue as the first element in the array.

getSplitProperty

public static java.lang.String[] getSplitProperty(java.lang.String key,
                                                  java.lang.String defaultValue,
                                                  java.lang.String regex)
Splits the value of the given key by the regex provided. Defaults to using trunnication of trailing whitespace in resulting array.

Parameters:
key - The key to get.
regex - The regular expression to split by.
defaultValue - The default value to use if the key is not found
Returns:
The value of the key, split by the specified regex if the key exists. defaultValue otherwise.

getSplitProperty

public static java.lang.String[] getSplitProperty(java.lang.String key,
                                                  java.lang.String regex)
Splits the value of the given key by the regex provided. Defaults to using trunnication of trailing whitespace in resulting array.

Parameters:
key - The key to get
regex - The regular expression to split by
Returns:
The value of the key, split by the specified regex if the key exists. Null otherwise.

getSplitProperty

public static java.lang.String[] getSplitProperty(java.lang.String key)
Splits the value of the given key by regular expression "," (splits into a array divided by the ,s in the key String). Defaults to using trunnication of trailing whitespace in resulting array.

Parameters:
key - The key to get.
Returns:
The value of the key, split by the regex "," if the key exists. Null otherwise.

Parameters:

value - The value to set the key to.

setProperty

                               java.lang.String value,
                               boolean save)
Sets the given property to the given value, and will save it if 'boolean save' is true.

Parameters:
key - The key to set.
value - The value to set it to.
save - If we should save the configuraiton.

writeConfiguration

Saves the configuration properties file

writeConfiguration

public static void writeConfiguration(java.io.OutputStream out)
Writes the configuration file to the specified output stream.

Parameters:
out - The output stream to write to.

reloadConfiguration

public static void reloadConfiguration()
                                throws java.io.IOException
Reloads the configuration file from disk. May delete non-saved in-bot changes.

Throws:
java.io.IOException

finish

public static void finish()
                   throws java.io.IOException
Closes all the input streams, throwing any Throwables. ONLY TO BE CALLED FROM CleanUp AT SHUTDOWN!!! Don't call me!!

Throws:
java.io.IOException - Shouldn't matter, as it's only called in CleanUp! But, for completeness, if the FileStreams fail to close, it throws the exception.

setTempDirective

public static void setTempDirective(java.lang.String key,
                                    java.lang.String value)
Sets a temporary directive. Temporary directives override what is in the configuration file (e.g. if there is a property called 'nick' in the temp directives, and one called 'nick' in the configuration file, the temp one would be returned from a call to lookUp("nick"). Temporary key-value pairs are not written to the configuration file on save.

Parameters:
key - The key to set.
value - The value to set it to.
